name: Speedy Harvest
description:
A tiny Harvester racing game made for the LD 52 Game Jam made in 17 hours.

This game uses the 2D Top down car controller from this video:

But has been adapted to work in 3D. It is very efficient and works well but only on flat surfaces and it can't handle jumping.

Models made in MagicaVoxel. 

Unity source code is available for Patreon supporters: https://www.patreon.com/posts/77085232
